title: My Champions all gone!!
body:
I just login today after 2 years not playing and what i find out all my bought champions aren't there. My question how to get it back? 

Rgds,
Skizie

replies.body: I've got your account pulled up and it doesn't look like anything fishy might have happened, and I do see a good number of champions and skins still in your inventory. Are there any specific champs you think you're missing?
